title: A Lego Set Based On The Very Pink Car From 2 Fast 2 Furious Is Coming Soon
description: 2 Fast 2 Furious is widely considered one of the worst Fast and Furious movies, but it did introduce the world to the Honda S2000 and the joy of going overboard with a custom paint job. If you're looking to add this eye-catching ride to your collection, Lego is adding it as a new kit to its Fast and Furious lineup, and you can preorder it now through The Lego Store for $27 ahead of its June 1 release. 2 Fast 2 Furious Honda S2000 (300 pieces) $27 | Releases June 1 This 300-piece set lets you build a replica of the bright pink Honda S2000 driven by Suki (Devon Aoki) in 2 Fast 2 Furious. It features screen-accurate details like an interior TV monitor, rear wing, grille, wheels, and anime-inspired graphics across the bodywork. While it doesn't have a working steering system like you'd find on bigger Lego Technic builds, the rubber wheels can spin for when you want to make the completed model go vroom. The set also includes a minifigure of Suki. Preorder at The Lego Store Gallery To add to your 2 Fast 2 Furious collection, you can also pick up the Nissan Skyline GTR 319-piece set while itls on sale for $20 (was $25) at Amazon. Like the 2 Fast 2 Furious Honda S2000, this set lands between a playset and the more complex Lego Technic line vehicles, making it an enjoyable afternoon build for all ages. It features the silver paint job with blue decals as seen in the movie, and comes with a Brian O'Conner minifigure.More Gaming, Tech, and Entertainment Deals & Preorders Amazon Sci-Fi And Fantasy Spring Book Sale - Save Big On Popular Box Sets James Bond Sean Connery 4K Steelbook Collection Is Up For Preorder Star Wars Skywalker Saga 4K Box Set Featured In Amazon's Spring Sale + Show More More Gaming, Tech, and Entertainment Deals & Preorders Links (5) 8BitDo Ultimate 2 Controller Gets Nice Discount A Month After Its Release Best 4K Blu-Rays & Box Sets In Amazon's B2G1 Free Big Spring Sale Lenovo Legion Go SteamOS Handheld Preorders Are Live At Best Buy Zelda: Twilight Princess 11-Book Manga Box Set Is Nearly 50% Off At Amazon Lego Transformers Optimus Prime Is Finally Back In Stock With A Big Discount
excerpt: This Lego replica of the Honda S2000 from 2 Fast 2 Furious launches June 1 and is available to preorder now.

It features screen-accurate details like an interior TV monitor, rear wing, grille, wheels, and anime-inspired graphics across the bodywork. html:
GameSpot may receive revenue from affiliate and advertising partnerships for sharing this content and from purchases through links.

2 Fast 2 Furious is widely considered one of the worst Fast and Furious movies, but it did introduce the world to the Honda S2000 and the joy of going overboard with a custom paint job. If you're looking to add this eye-catching ride to your collection, Lego is adding it as a new kit to its Fast and Furious lineup, and you can preorder it now through The Lego Store for $27 ahead of its June 1 release.

2 Fast 2 Furious Honda S2000 (300 pieces)

$27 | Releases June 1

This 300-piece set lets you build a replica of the bright pink Honda S2000 driven by Suki (Devon Aoki) in 2 Fast 2 Furious. It features screen-accurate details like an interior TV monitor, rear wing, grille, wheels, and anime-inspired graphics across the bodywork. While it doesn't have a working steering system like you'd find on bigger Lego Technic builds, the rubber wheels can spin for when you want to make the completed model go vroom. The set also includes a minifigure of Suki.

To add to your 2 Fast 2 Furious collection, you can also pick up the Nissan Skyline GTR 319-piece set while itls on sale for $20 (was $25) at Amazon. Like the 2 Fast 2 Furious Honda S2000, this set lands between a playset and the more complex Lego Technic line vehicles, making it an enjoyable afternoon build for all ages. It features the silver paint job with blue decals as seen in the movie, and comes with a Brian O'Conner minifigure.
